description:
Seven Knights - Time Wanderer -  Cosplay Costume Set
 Time to dress up the characters in what suits them best! The Cosplay Set brings out their personalities!
 
 <Set Contents>
 - Vanessa's Costume "Desert Garnet"
 - Hayoung's Costume "Snowflake Rhapsody"
 - Shane's Costume - "Kendo Captain"
 Orly's Costume "Owl Maid"
 - Karl Heron's Costume "Prince of Blood"
 - Aquila's Costume "Shepherd of Battle"
 - Ace's Costume "Moonlight Warrior"
 - Kagura's Costume "Festival of Flowers"
 - Lina's Costume "Pink Diamond"
 - Teo's Costume "Crow High Steward"
 - Rudy's Costume "Ethereal Guardian"
 - Elysia's Costume "Starlight Guide"
 - Kris's Costume "Azure Executor"
 - Karma's Costume "Night Goblin"
 - Rin's Costume "Shepherd of Souls"
 15 Total
 
 <Warning>
 - You can only purchase the costume set once.
 - You can use equip in-game after purchasing.
 - Please claim from "May" in the Room of Sand.
 - Hero portraits don't change.
 - Costumes only change hero appearance - they don't increase stats.
name: Cosplay Costume Set (15 Total)
